entry.title: Computer Graphics 202003-202006 Part1
entry.content:
0 Course Overview

Goal

  • The theoretical basics of CG
  • Knowledge of WebgGL,writting some code about interact and non-interact 3D graphics.

Bibliography

  • M. Gribaudo, BEEP
  • Computer Graphics: Principles and Practice in C, Editore: Addison-Wesley Professional, ISBN: 978-0201848403

Course Evaluation

  • several assignments(alone) + a complete project(group:1-3 people,36:00前后)
    • Assignments在Exam期间才需要提交，平时不用交
    • 分数评估取决于project的情况，如果project很好assignmnets不再重要。
  • oral discussion where the project and the assignments + Some theory questions
  • Projects topics and rules will be presented at the middle of the course, when we will have seen sufficient material to start it.

Lecture1 Graphics adapters(图形适配器), colors and 2D drawings

Graphics adapters

  • Vector graphic adapters (ancient history)

  • Raster graphic adapters(光栅)

    • Have a special memory, called Video Memory (VRAM).

  • Accelerated graphic adapters

    • special types of raster graphic adapters that have much more memory than the one required to store a single screenshot.

Color vision

  2. 人眼对颜色的感知

    • cones (sometimes called ρ-red, β-green, γ-blue)
  3. Color reproduction
  4. Color composition
  5. Color range
  6. Color synthesis
  7. Color quantization
  8. Image resolution
  9. Display resolution
  10. Pixel aspect ratio

2D graphics primitives

  1. 2D Graphics Primitives - coordinates system
  2. Pixel coordinates(hardware coordinates)
    • Note that the coordinate system is left-handed, since it has the y-axis in the opposite direction compared to the classical one.
    • $ 0 <= x <= sw -1$ $0 <= y <= sh -1 $
  3. Clipping
  4. Normalized Screen Coordinates (102:00 未解决的问题 cut ??)
    • Goal: Applications want to display the same image regardless of the resolution and the size of the screen. They also want to exploit all the features of the display at their best.
    • It’s a Cartesian coordinate system, where x and y values range between two canonical values (generally between -1 and 1, but other standards such as 0 and 1 also exists).
  5. Points,Lines,Triangles

Assignment01

這是紅色的字

entry.title: Statistics - Learning Path 统计学习路径
entry.content:
0 Prerequisites：Probability and Inferential Statistics

Course: MIT Probabilistic Systems Analysis and Applied Probability(概率分析及应用)

01/03/2020 - 20/03/2020

Bilibili中字课程,not include seminar/tutoria：https://www.bilibili.com/video/av39034423?p=17
Bilibili原版课程,including seminar/tutoria：https://www.bilibili.com/video/av39034423?p=17

1 Applied Statistics 2020.03-2020.06

1.1 Overview

1) 探索多元数据集：描述性统计数据和图形显示。多元样本的几何形状。广义方差。协方差矩阵导出的度量。
Exploring a multivariate dataset: descriptive statistics and graphical displays. The geometry of a multivariate sample. Generalized Variance. The metric induced by the covariance matrix.

2) 数据表示和降维：协方差结构分析，主成分分析。独立成分分析。
Data representation and dimensional reduction: the analysis of the covariance structure, principal component analysis. Independent component analysis.

3) 关于平均向量的推论：$Hotelling T^2$检验。置信区域和分量均值的同时比较。Bonferroni方法可进行多次比较。
Inferences about a mean vector:$Hotelling T^2$test. Confidence regions and simultaneous comparisons of component means. The Bonferroni method for multiple comparisons.
家庭错误率和错误发现率。几种多元均值的比较。方差分析和MANOVA。线性模型的推论。
Familywise Error Rate and False Discovery Rate. Comparisons of several multivariate means. ANOVA and MANOVA. Inference for Linear Models.
超越最小二乘法：岭回归，套索，正则化最小二乘。广义线性模型简介。
Beyond Ordinary Least Squares: ridge regression, lasso, regularized least Squares. Introduction to generalized linear models.

4) 区分，分类，聚类。统计分类：模型，分类错误成本和先验概率。
Discrimination, classification, clustering. Statistical classification: model, misclassification costs and prior probability.
贝叶斯监督分类和Fisher方法进行判别分析。
Bayesian supervised classification and the Fisher approach to discriminant analysis.
分类的替代方法：逻辑回归，CART。相似性度量。无监督分类；分层和非分层方法。多维缩放。
Alternative approaches to classification: logistic regression, CART. Similarity measures. Unsupervised classification; hierarchical and nonhierarchical methods. Multidimensional scaling.

5) 统计学习的进展：功能数据分析。数据平滑，降维和表示。功能主成分分析。数据记录：相位和幅度可变性。功能数据分类。
Advances in Statistical Learning: Functional Data Analysis. Data smoothing, dimensional reduction and representation. Functional principal component analysis. Data registration: phase and amplitude variability. Classification of functional data.

6) 统计学习的进展：空间数据。随机字段，方差图模型和方差图拟合。空间预测和Kriging，具有空间依赖性的功能数据。
Advances in Statistical Learning: spatial data. Random fields, variogram models and variogram fitting. Spatial prediction and Kriging, Functional data with spatial dependence.

1.2

2.英语口语练习 — 打卡

2.1 Echo Method

回音法介绍https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/31760454
1.把整段影片扫过一次
2.熟读文字档
3.仔细听一段话：播放5个字以内的一段话，专心的听。留意发音、语调、重音，并配合文字档听懂意思。
4.在心里重复“回音”：把刚刚听到的那段话，在心里 replay一次。
5.模仿“回音”，念出来
6.重复步骤4-6直到你可以自然说出那段话
7.迈入下一段话
在https://www.lingorank.com/上寻找合适难度及内容的材料。
在https://www.ted.com/上找到对应的视频和文档练习

2.2 Youtube:Teacher Mike 麦克老师

List1: 从零开始学英语系列

  • 7:15【从零开始】第一期：学英语，从入门到摔门！
  • 5:18【从零开始】第二期：学会这些英语单词就可以走遍天下!
  • 5:57【从零开始】第三期：和美国记者谈笑风生！最常用英语句型大放送！
  • 5:33【从零开始】第四期：克服10个坏习惯，英语满分不是梦！
  • 5:54【从零开始】第五期：5分钟搞定Have Has Had！
  • 6:49【从零开始】第六期：只要30句，和歪果仁无障碍交流！
  • 8:50【精华版】零基础入门学英语，看完这个，让你事半功倍！
  • 11:22【从零开始】你所见过最全面的数字英语，从零到亿，从数字到数学
  • 43:03【从零开始】掌握这625个单词，让你的英语水平突飞猛进
  • 7:20 为什么不该让谷歌进入中国
  • 35:54【从零开始】175个最实用英语会话句型
  • 36:32【从零开始】250句必备的旅游英语

3 Courses Schedule
